body:
Hey! I suppose it is time for me to do one. However this is a "Ask Me ALMOST Anything". So I will not answer questions about where I live specifically etc.

So....ask away.

title: AMaA - x_Redstone_

replies.body: Favourite and hardest Projekt you have ever done with Redstone?

replies.body:
@Zero
Favorite: Combination locks or adventure maps.
Hardest: Clock

@_TinyBear
No, I do not.
No, but if it is you, yes.

@Acceqted
I have played on Avicus for SO long and I have a lot of other experience.
I don't know yet...
Aqua (Dark Cyan in Minecraft terms)
Ummm, I think you are.....question....y...
